mapper.select: select t.`id`,t.`tuihuo_num`,t.`zhidan_people`,t.`danju_day`,t.`mfrsid`,m.`mfrsname`,t.`position_id`,p.`position_name`, t.`goodsbrandname`,t.`beizhu`,t.`goodsxinxiid`,t.`goods_num`, t.`goods_name`,t.`factory`,t.`unit`,t.`goods_count`,t.`count`,t.`goods_code`,t.`style`,t.`retail_price`,t.`stockorder` from stock_tuihuo t left join c_mfrs m on t.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_position p on t.position_id=t.position_id where t.id = #{value} group by t.id
mapper.delete:
delete from stock_tuihuo where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select t.tuihuo_num,t.danju_day,m.mfrsname,p.position_name,t.beizhu,t.zhidan_people,t.style from stock_tuihuo t left join c_mfrs m on t.mfrsid = m.mfrsnum left join c_position p on t.position_id=p.position_id where t.tuihuo_num = #{value} group by t.tuihuo_num
